title: Lvl 5 Spells
content: , Solidarity Domain Planar Binding Abjuration ActionLevel 5 Spell Slot No Target an otherworldly creature and attach its consciousness to your own. It will follow and fight for you as an ally.10 TurnsTarget must be a celestial, an elemental, a fey, or a fiend. 18m WIS SaveConcentration Bard, Cleric, Arcana Domain, Druid, Wizard Seeming Illusion ActionLevel 5 Spell Slot No Disguise up to 4 memebers of your adventuring party. 18m Bard, Sorcerer, Archfey, Wizard Telekinesis Transmutation ActionLeve
